description:
Two worlds in one shoe. By combining flat and curved designs in the Arai, Tenaya has created a supportive, climb-anywhere shoe. With a medium stiffness and thinner rubber, the Arai cradles your foot, while still letting you the feel the surface for precise foot placements.

  • Microfibre upper ensures a consistent fit over time
  • Light and breathable bellows tongue wraps your feet while keeping you dry
  • Re-inforced toe-box offers greater durability so you can climb for longer
  • Velcro® straps and heel tabs allows for an easy on/off with solid support
  • 4 micro-layer insole provides direct input, because small movements make a big difference
  • Adaptable last works with wide and narrow feet
name: Tenaya Arai Rock Shoes - Unisex
